GSD36manu1__u:2372: Manu6.18c/ ṣaṇmāsa.nicayo vā syāt samā.nicaya eva vā ||
GSD36manu1__u:2373: Manu6.19a/ naktaṃ ca-annaṃ samaśnīyād divā vā-āhṛtya śaktitaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2374: Manu6.19c/ caturthakāliko vā syāt syād vā-apy aṣṭama.kālikaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2375: Manu6.20a/ cāndrāyaṇavidhānair vā śukla.kṛṣṇe ca vartayet |
GSD36manu1__u:2376: Manu6.20c/ pakṣāntayor vā-apy aśnīyād yavāgūṃ kvathitāṃ sakṛt ||
GSD36manu1__u:2377: Manu6.21a/ puṣpa.mūla.phalair vā-api kevalair vartayet sadā |
GSD36manu1__u:2378: Manu6.21c/ kālapakvaiḥ svayaṃ śīrṇair vaikhānasamate sthitaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2379: Manu6.22a/ bhūmau viparivarteta tiṣṭhed vā prapadair dinam |
GSD36manu1__u:2381: Manu6.23a/ grīṣme pañca.tapās tu syād varṣāsv abhra.avakāśikaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2382: Manu6.23c/ ārdra.vāsās tu hemante kramaśo vardhayaṃs tapaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2383: Manu6.24a/ upaspṛśaṃs triṣavaṇaṃ pitqn devāṃś ca tarpayet |
GSD36manu1__u:2384: Manu6.24c/ tapas-caraṃś ca-ugrataraṃ śoṣayed deham ātmanaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2385: Manu6.25a/ agnīn ātmani vaitānān samāropya yathāvidhi |
GSD36manu1__u:2386: Manu6.25c/ an.agnir a.niketaḥ syān munir mūla.phala.aśanaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2389: Manu6.27a/ tāpaseṣv eva vipreṣu yātrikaṃ bhaikṣam āharet |
GSD36manu1__u:2391: Manu6.28a/ grāmād āhṛtya vā-aśnīyād aṣṭau grāsān vane vasan |
GSD36manu1__u:2392: Manu6.28c/ pratigṛhya puṭena-eva pāṇinā śakalena vā ||
GSD36manu1__u:2393: Manu6.29a/ etāś ca-anyāś ca seveta dīkṣā vipro vane vasan |
GSD36manu1__u:2395: Manu6.30a/ ṛṣibhir brāhmaṇaiś ca-eva gṛhasthair eva sevitāḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2397: Manu6.31a/ aparājitāṃ vā-āsthāya vrajed diśam ajihmagaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2401: Manu6.33a/ vaneṣu ca vihṛtya-evaṃ tṛtīyaṃ bhāgam āyuṣaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2402: Manu6.33c/ caturtham āyuṣo bhāgaṃ tyakvā saṅgān parivrajet ||
GSD36manu1__u:2403: Manu6.34a/ āśramād āśramaṃ gatvā huta.homo jita.indriyaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2405: Manu6.35a/ ṛṇāni trīṇy apākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet |
GSD36manu1__u:2406: Manu6.35c/ an.apākṛtya mokṣaṃ tu sevamāno vrajaty adhaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2407: Manu6.36a/ adhītya vidhivad vedān putrāṃś ca-utpādya dharmataḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2408: Manu6.36c/ iṣṭvā ca śaktito yajñair mano mokṣe niveśayet ||
GSD36manu1__u:2409: Manu6.37a/ an.adhītya dvijo vedān an.utpādya tathā sutān |
GSD36manu1__u:2411: Manu6.37c/ an.iṣṭvā ca-eva yajñaiś ca mokṣam icchan vrajaty adhaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2414: Manu6.38c/ ātmany agnīn samāropya brāhmaṇaḥ pravrajed gṛhāt ||
GSD36manu1__u:2415: Manu6.39a/ yo dattvā sarvabhūtebhyaḥ pravrajaty abhayaṃ gṛhāt |
GSD36manu1__u:2416: Manu6.39c/ tasya tejomayā lokā bhavanti brahmavādinaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2417: Manu6.40a/ yasmād aṇu-api bhūtānāṃ dvijān na-utpadyate bhayam |
GSD36manu1__u:2418: Manu6.40c/ tasya dehād vimuktasya bhayaṃ na-asti kutaś cana ||
GSD36manu1__u:2421: Manu6.42a/ eka eva caren nityaṃ siddhyartham asahāyavān |
GSD36manu1__u:2422: Manu6.42c/ siddhim ekasya saṃpaśyan na jahāti na hīyate || [M.siddham]
GSD36manu1__u:2423: Manu6.43a/ an.agnir a.niketaḥ syād grāmam annārtham āśrayet |
GSD36manu1__u:2428: Manu6.44c/ samatā ca-eva sarvasminn etat-muktasya lakṣaṇam ||
GSD36manu1__u:2430: Manu6.45c/ kālam eva pratīkṣeta nirveśaṃ bhṛtako yathā ||
GSD36manu1__u:2431: Manu6.46a/ dṛṣṭipūtaṃ nyaset pādaṃ vastrapūtaṃ jalaṃ pibet |
GSD36manu1__u:2432: Manu6.46c/ satyapūtāṃ vaded vācaṃ manaḥpūtaṃ samācaret ||
GSD36manu1__u:2433: Manu6.47a/ ativādāṃs titikṣeta na-avamanyeta kaṃ cana |
GSD36manu1__u:2434: Manu6.47c/ na ca-imaṃ deham āśritya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cit ||
GSD36manu1__u:2435: Manu6.48a/ kruddhyantaṃ na pratikrudhyed ākruṣṭaḥ kuśalaṃ vadet |
GSD36manu1__u:2436: Manu6.48c/ saptadvārāvakīrṇāṃ ca na vācam anṛtāṃ vadet ||
GSD36manu1__u:2438: Manu6.49c/ ātmanā-eva sahāyena sukhārthī vicared iha ||
GSD36manu1__u:2440: Manu6.50c/ na-anuśāsana.vādābhyāṃ bhikṣāṃ lipseta karhi cit ||
GSD36manu1__u:2441: Manu6.51a/ na tāpasair brāhmaṇair vā vayobhir api vā śvabhiḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2442: Manu6.51c/ ākīrṇaṃ bhikṣukair vā-anyair agāram upasaṃvrajet ||
GSD36manu1__u:2444: Manu6.52c/ vicaren niyato nityaṃ sarvabhūtāny a.pīḍayan ||
GSD36manu1__u:2445: Manu6.53a/ ataijasāni pātrāṇi tasya syur nir.vraṇāni ca |
GSD36manu1__u:2446: Manu6.53c/ teṣām adbhiḥ smṛtaṃ śaucaṃ camasānām iva-adhvare ||
GSD36manu1__u:2447: Manu6.54a/ alābuṃ dārupātraṃ ca mṛṇmayaṃ vaidalaṃ tathā |
GSD36manu1__u:2449: Manu6.55a/ ekakālaṃ cared bhaikṣaṃ na prasajjeta vistare |
GSD36manu1__u:2450: Manu6.55c/ bhaikṣe prasakto hi yatir viṣayeṣv api sajjati ||
GSD36manu1__u:2452: Manu6.56c/ vṛtte śarāvasaṃpāte bhikṣāṃ nityaṃ yatiś caret ||
GSD36manu1__u:2453: Manu6.57a/ alābhe na viṣadī syāt-lābhe ca-eva na harṣayet |
GSD36manu1__u:2456: Manu6.58c/ abhipūjitalābhaiś ca yatir mukto 'api badhyate ||
GSD36manu1__u:2460: Manu6.60c/ ahiṃsayā ca bhūtānām amṛtatvāya kalpate ||
GSD36manu1__u:2462: Manu6.61c/ niraye ca-eva patanaṃ yātanāś ca yamakṣaye ||
GSD36manu1__u:2463: Manu6.62a/ viprayogaṃ priyaiś ca-eva saṃyogaṃ ca tathā-apriyaiḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2465: Manu6.63a/ dehād utkramaṇaṃ ca-aṣmāt punar garbhe ca saṃbhavam |
GSD36manu1__u:2470: Manu6.65c/ deheṣu ca samutpattim uttameṣv adhameṣu ca || [M.deheṣu
GSD36manu1__u:2472: Manu6.66a/ dūṣito 'api cared dharmaṃ yatra tatra-āśrame rataḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2475: Manu6.66c/ samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu na liṅgaṃ dharmakāraṇam ||
GSD36manu1__u:2476: Manu6.67a/ phalaṃ katakavṛkṣasya yady apy ambuprasādakam |
GSD36manu1__u:2477: Manu6.67c/ na nāmagrahaṇād eva tasya vāri prasīdati ||
GSD36manu1__u:2478: Manu6.68a/ saṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ jantūnāṃ rātrāv ahani vā sadā |
GSD36manu1__u:2479: Manu6.68c/ śarīrasya-atyaye ca-eva samīkṣya vasudhāṃ caret ||
GSD36manu1__u:2480: Manu6.69a/ ahnā rātryā ca yāñ jantūn hinasty ajñānato yatiḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2481: Manu6.69c/ teṣāṃ snātvā viśuddhyarthaṃ prāṇāyāmān ṣaḍ ācaret ||
GSD36manu1__u:2482: Manu6.70a/ prāṇāyāmā brāhmaṇasya trayo 'api vidhivat kṛtāḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2483: Manu6.70c/ vyāhṛti.praṇavair yuktā vijñeyaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2484: Manu6.71a/ dahyante dhmāyamānānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hi yathā malāḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2485: Manu6.71c/ tathā-indriyāṇāṃ dahyante doṣāḥ prāṇasya nigrahāt ||
GSD36manu1__u:2486: Manu6.72a/ prāṇāyamair dahed doṣān dhāraṇābhiś ca kilbiṣam |
GSD36manu1__u:2491: Manu6.74c/ darśanena vihīnas tu saṃsāraṃ pratipadyate ||
GSD36manu1__u:2493: Manu6.75c/ tapasaś caraṇaiś ca-ugraiḥ sādhayanti-iha tatpadam ||
GSD36manu1__u:2497: Manu6.77c/ rajasvalam anityaṃ ca bhūtāvāsam imaṃ tyajet ||
GSD36manu1__u:2498: Manu6.78a/ nadīkūlaṃ yathā vṛkṣo vṛkṣaṃ vā śakunir yathā |
GSD36manu1__u:2499: Manu6.78c/ tathā tyajann imaṃ dehaṃ kṛcchrād grāhād vimucyate ||
GSD36manu1__u:2500: Manu6.79a/ priyeṣu sveṣu sukṛtam apriyeṣu ca duṣkṛtam |
GSD36manu1__u:2502: Manu6.80a/ yadā bhāvena bhavati sarvabhāveṣu niḥspṛhaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2503: Manu6.80c/ tadā sukham avāpnoti pretya ca-iha ca śāśvatam ||
GSD36manu1__u:2504: Manu6.81a/ anena vidhinā sarvāṃs tyaktvā saṅgān-śanaiḥ śanaiḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2506: Manu6.82a/ dhyānikaṃ sarvam eva-etad yad etad abhiśabditam |
GSD36manu1__u:2507: Manu6.82c/ na hy an.adhyātmavit kaś cit kriyāphalam upāśnute ||
GSD36manu1__u:2508: Manu6.83a/ adhiyajñaṃ brahma japed ādhidaivikam eva ca |
GSD36manu1__u:2509: Manu6.83c/ ādhyātmikaṃ ca satataṃ vedāntābhihitaṃ ca yat ||
GSD36manu1__u:2510: Manu6.84a/ idaṃ śaraṇam ajñānām idam eva vijānatām |
GSD36manu1__u:2511: Manu6.84c/ idam anvicchatāṃ svargam idam ānantyam icchatām ||
GSD36manu1__u:2512: Manu6.85a/ anena kramayogena parivrajati yo dvijaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2513: Manu6.85c/ sa vidhūya-iha pāpmānaṃ paraṃ brahma-adhigacchati ||
GSD36manu1__u:2514: Manu6.86a/ eṣa dharmo 'anuśiṣṭo vo yatīnāṃ niyata.ātmanām |
GSD36manu1__u:2516: Manu6.87a/ brahmacārī gṛhasthaś ca vānaprastho yatis tathā |
GSD36manu1__u:2517: Manu6.87c/ ete gṛhastha.prabhavāś catvāraḥ pṛthag āśramāḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2518: Manu6.88a/ sarve 'api kramaśas tv ete yathāśāstraṃ niṣevitāḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2519: Manu6.88c/ yathā.ukta.kāriṇaṃ vipraṃ nayanti paramāṃ gatim ||
GSD36manu1__u:2522: Manu6.89c/ gṛhastha ucyate śreṣṭhaḥ sa trīn etān bibharti hi ||
GSD36manu1__u:2523: Manu6.90a/ yathā nadī.nadāḥ sarve sāgare yānti saṃsthitim |
GSD36manu1__u:2524: Manu6.90c/ tathā-eva-āśramiṇaḥ sarve gṛhasthe yānti saṃsthitim ||
GSD36manu1__u:2525: Manu6.91a/ caturbhir api ca-eva-etair nityam āśramibhir dvijaiḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2527: Manu6.92a/ dhṛtiḥ kṣamā damo 'asteyaṃ śaucam indriyanigrahaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2528: Manu6.92c/ dhīr vidyā satyam akrodho daśakaṃ dharmalakṣaṇam ||
GSD36manu1__u:2529: Manu6.93a/ daśa lakṣaṇāni dharmasya ye viprāḥ samadhīyate |
GSD36manu1__u:2530: Manu6.93c/ adhītya ca-anuvartante te yānti paramāṃ gatim ||
GSD36manu1__u:2532: Manu6.94c/ vedāntaṃ vidhivat-śrutvā saṃnyased an.ṛṇo dvijaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2534: Manu6.95c/ niyato vedam abhyasya putraiśvarye sukhaṃ vaset ||
GSD36manu1__u:2537: Manu6.97a/ eṣa vo 'abhihito dharmo brāhmaṇasya catur.vidhaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2538: Manu6.97c/ puṇyo 'akṣaya.phalaḥ pretya rājñāṃ dharmaṃ nibodhata ||
GSD36manu1__u:2539: Manu7.01a/ rājadharmān pravakṣyāmi yathāvṛtto bhaven nṛpaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2540: Manu7.01c/ saṃbhavaś ca yathā tasya siddhiś ca paramā yathā ||
GSD36manu1__u:2541: Manu7.02a/ brāhmaṃ prāptena saṃskāraṃ kṣatriyeṇa yathāvidhi |
GSD36manu1__u:2543: Manu7.03a/ a.rājake hi loke 'asmin sarvato vidruto bhayāt |
GSD36manu1__u:2544: Manu7.03c/ rakṣārtham asya sarvasya rājānam asṛjat prabhuḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2545: Manu7.04a/ indra.anila.yama.arkāṇām agneś ca varuṇasya ca |
GSD36manu1__u:2546: Manu7.04c/ candra.vitteśayoś ca-eva mātrā nirhṛtya śāśvatīḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2547: Manu7.05a/ yasmād eṣāṃ surendrāṇāṃ mātrābhyo nirmito nṛpaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2548: Manu7.05c/ tasmād abhibhavaty eṣa sarvabhūtāni tejasā ||
GSD36manu1__u:2549: Manu7.06a/ tapaty ādityavac ca-eṣa cakṣūṃṣi ca manāṃsi ca |
GSD36manu1__u:2550: Manu7.06c/ na ca-enaṃ bhuvi śaknoti kaś cid apy abhivīkṣitum ||
GSD36manu1__u:2551: Manu7.07a/ so 'agnir bhavati vāyuś ca so 'arkaḥ somaḥ sa dharmarāṭ |
GSD36manu1__u:2552: Manu7.07c/ sa kuberaḥ sa varuṇaḥ sa mahendraḥ prabhāvataḥ || [M.sa
GSD36manu1__u:2554: Manu7.08a/ bālo 'api na-avamāntavyo manuṣya iti bhūmipaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2555: Manu7.08c/ mahatī devatā hy eṣā nararūpeṇa tiṣṭhati ||
GSD36manu1__u:2556: Manu7.09a/ ekam eva dahaty agnir naraṃ durupasarpiṇam |
GSD36manu1__u:2558: Manu7.10a/ kāryaṃ so 'avekṣya śaktiṃ ca deśa.kālau ca tattvataḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2559: Manu7.10c/ kurute dharmasiddhyarthaṃ viśvarūpaṃ punaḥ punaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2560: Manu7.11a/ yasya prasāde padmā śrīr vijayaś ca parākrame |
GSD36manu1__u:2561: Manu7.11c/ mṛtyuś ca vasati krodhe sarvatejomayo hi saḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2562: Manu7.12a/ taṃ yas tu dveṣṭi saṃmohāt sa vinaśyaty asaṃśayam |
GSD36manu1__u:2563: Manu7.12c/ tasya hy āśu vināśāya rājā prakurute manaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2564: Manu7.13a/ tasmād dharmaṃ yam iṣṭeṣu sa vyavasyen narādhipaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2565: Manu7.13c/ aniṣṭaṃ ca-apy aniṣṭeṣu taṃ dharmaṃ na vicālayet ||
GSD36manu1__u:2566: Manu7.14a/ tasyārthe sarvabhūtānāṃ goptāraṃ dharmam ātmajam |
GSD36manu1__u:2568: Manu7.14c/ brahmatejomayaṃ daṇḍam asṛjat pūrvam īśvaraḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2569: Manu7.15a/ tasya sarvāṇi bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca |
GSD36manu1__u:2570: Manu7.15c/ bhayād bhogāya kalpante svadharmāt-na calanti ca ||
GSD36manu1__u:2571: Manu7.16a/ taṃ deśa.kālau śaktiṃ ca vidyāṃ ca-avekṣya tattvataḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2573: Manu7.17a/ sa rājā puruṣo daṇḍaḥ sa netā śāsitā ca saḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2574: Manu7.17c/ caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ ca dharmasya pratibhūḥ smṛtaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2575: Manu7.18a/ daṇḍaḥ śāsti prajāḥ sarvā daṇḍa eva-abhirakṣati |
GSD36manu1__u:2576: Manu7.18c/ daṇḍaḥ supteṣu jāgarti daṇḍaṃ dharmaṃ vidur budhāḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2577: Manu7.19a/ samīkṣya sa dhṛtaḥ samyak sarvā rañjayati prajāḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2578: Manu7.19c/ a.samīkṣya praṇītas tu vināśayati sarvataḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2579: Manu7.20a/ yadi na praṇayed rājā daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣv atandritaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2580: Manu7.20c/ śūle matsyān iva-apakṣyan durbalān balavattarāḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2581: Manu7.21a/ adyāt kākaḥ puroḍāśaṃ śvā ca lihyādd havis tathā |
GSD36manu1__u:2583: Manu7.21c/ svāmyaṃ ca na syāt kasmiṃś cit pravarteta-adhara.uttaram ||
GSD36manu1__u:2584: Manu7.22a/ sarvo daṇḍajito loko durlabho hi śucir naraḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2585: Manu7.22c/ daṇḍasya hi bhayāt sarvaṃ jagad bhogāya kalpate ||
GSD36manu1__u:2587: Manu7.23c/ te 'api bhogāya kalpante daṇḍena-eva nipīḍitāḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2588: Manu7.24a/ duṣyeyuḥ sarvavarṇāś ca bhidyeran sarvasetavaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2589: Manu7.24c/ sarvalokaprakopaś ca bhaved daṇḍasya vibhramāt ||
GSD36manu1__u:2590: Manu7.25a/ yatra śyāmo lohita.akṣo daṇḍaś carati pāpahā |
GSD36manu1__u:2591: Manu7.25c/ prajās tatra na muhyanti netā cet sādhu paśyati ||
GSD36manu1__u:2594: Manu7.27a/ taṃ rājā praṇayan samyak trivargeṇa-abhivardhate |
GSD36manu1__u:2595: Manu7.27c/ kāma.ātmā viṣamaḥ kṣudro daṇḍena-eva nihanyate || [M.kāma.andho
GSD36manu1__u:2596: Manu7.28a/ daṇḍo hi sumahat.tejo durdharaś ca-akṛta.ātmabhiḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2597: Manu7.28c/ dharmād vicalitaṃ hanti nṛpam eva sa.bāndhavam ||
GSD36manu1__u:2598: Manu7.29a/ tato durgaṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca lokaṃ ca sa.cara.acaram |
GSD36manu1__u:2599: Manu7.29c/ antarikṣagatāṃś ca-eva munīn devāṃś ca pīḍayet ||
GSD36manu1__u:2601: Manu7.30c/ na śakyo nyāyato netuṃ saktena viṣayeṣu ca ||
GSD36manu1__u:2603: Manu7.31c/ praṇetuṃ śakyate daṇḍaḥ susahāyena dhīmatā ||
GSD36manu1__u:2604: Manu7.32a/ svarāṣṭre nyāyavṛttaḥ syād bhṛśa.daṇḍaś ca śatruṣu |
GSD36manu1__u:2605: Manu7.32c/ suhṛtsv ajihmaḥ snigdheṣu brāhmaṇeṣu kṣamānvitaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2607: Manu7.33c/ vistīryate yaśo loke tailabindur iva-ambhasi ||
GSD36manu1__u:2608: Manu7.34a/ atas tu viparītasya nṛpater ajita.ātmanaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2609: Manu7.34c/ saṃkṣipyate yaśo loke ghṛtabindur iva-ambhasi ||
GSD36manu1__u:2610: Manu7.35a/ sve sve dharme niviṣṭānāṃ sarveṣām anupūrvaśaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2611: Manu7.35c/ varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca rājā sṛṣṭo 'abhirakṣitā ||
GSD36manu1__u:2612: Manu7.36a/ tena yad yat sa.bhṛtyena kartavyaṃ rakṣatā prajāḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2613: Manu7.36c/ tat tad vo 'ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2614: Manu7.37a/ brāhmaṇān paryupāsīta prātar utthāya pārthivaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2615: Manu7.37c/ traividyavṛddhān viduṣas tiṣṭhet teṣāṃ ca śāsane ||
GSD36manu1__u:2616: Manu7.38a/ vṛddhāṃś ca nityaṃ seveta viprān vedavidaḥ śucīn |
GSD36manu1__u:2617: Manu7.38c/ vṛddhasevī hi satataṃ rakṣobhir api pūjyate ||
GSD36manu1__u:2619: Manu7.39c/ vinīta.ātmā hi nṛpatir na vinaśyati karhi cit ||
GSD36manu1__u:2622: Manu7.40c/ vanasthā api rājyāni vinayāt pratipedire ||
GSD36manu1__u:2624: Manu7.41c/ sudāḥ paijavanaś ca-eva sumukho nimir eva ca ||
GSD36manu1__u:2625: Manu7.42a/ pṛthus tu vinayād rājyaṃ prāptavān manur eva ca |
GSD36manu1__u:2626: Manu7.42c/ kuberaś ca dhanaiśvaryaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ ca-eva gādhijaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2627: Manu7.43a/ traividyebhyas trayīṃ vidyāṃ daṇḍanītiṃ ca śāśvatīm |
GSD36manu1__u:2630: Manu7.43c/ ānvīkṣikīṃ ca-ātmavidyāṃ vārtārambhāṃś ca lokataḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2631: Manu7.44a/ indriyāṇāṃ jaye yogaṃ samātiṣṭhed divā.niśam |
GSD36manu1__u:2632: Manu7.44c/ jita.indriyo hi śaknoti vaśe sthāpayituṃ prajāḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2633: Manu7.45a/ daśa kāma.samutthāni tathā-aṣṭau krodhajāni ca |
GSD36manu1__u:2635: Manu7.46a/ kāmajeṣu prasakto hi vyasaneṣu mahīpatiḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2637: Manu7.47a/ mṛgayā-akṣo divāsvapnaḥ parivādaḥ striyo madaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2638: Manu7.47c/ tauryatrikaṃ vṛthāṭyā ca kāmajo daśako gaṇaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2640: Manu7.48c/ vāgdaṇḍajaṃ ca pāruṣyaṃ krodhajo 'api gaṇo 'aṣṭakaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2641: Manu7.49a/ dvayor apy etayor mūlaṃ yaṃ sarve kavayo viduḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2642: Manu7.49c/ taṃ yatnena jayet-lobhaṃ tajjāv etāv ubhau gaṇau ||
GSD36manu1__u:2643: Manu7.50a/ pānam akṣāḥ striyaś ca-eva mṛgayā ca yathākramam |
GSD36manu1__u:2644: Manu7.50c/ etat kaṣṭatamaṃ vidyāt-catuṣkaṃ kāmaje gaṇe ||
GSD36manu1__u:2646: Manu7.51c/ krodhaje 'api gaṇe vidyāt kaṣṭam etat trikaṃ sadā ||
GSD36manu1__u:2648: Manu7.52c/ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ gurutaraṃ vidyād vyasanam ātmavān |
GSD36manu1__u:2649: Manu7.53a/ vyasanasya ca mṛtyoś ca vyasanaṃ kaṣṭam ucyate |
GSD36manu1__u:2650: Manu7.53c/ vyasany adho 'adho vrajati svar yāty avyasanī mṛtaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2653: Manu7.54c/ sacivān sapta ca-aṣṭau vā prakurvīta parīkṣitān || [M.kurvīta
GSD36manu1__u:2655: Manu7.55a/ api yat sukaraṃ karma tad apy ekena duṣkaram |
GSD36manu1__u:2656: Manu7.55c/ viśeṣato 'asahāyena kiṃ tu rājyaṃ mahā.udayam || [M.kiṃ nu ]
GSD36manu1__u:2657: Manu7.56a/ taiḥ sārdhaṃ cintayen nityaṃ sāmānyaṃ saṃdhi.vigraham |
GSD36manu1__u:2658: Manu7.56c/ sthānaṃ samudayaṃ guptiṃ labdhapraśamanāni ca ||
GSD36manu1__u:2659: Manu7.57a/ teṣāṃ svaṃ svam abhiprāyam upalabhya pṛthak pṛthak |
GSD36manu1__u:2660: Manu7.57c/ samastānāṃ ca kāryeṣu vidadhyādd hitam ātmanaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2661: Manu7.58a/ sarveṣāṃ tu viśiṣṭena brāhmaṇena vipaścitā |
GSD36manu1__u:2662: Manu7.58c/ mantrayet paramaṃ mantraṃ rājā ṣāḍguṇyasaṃyutam ||
GSD36manu1__u:2663: Manu7.59a/ nityaṃ tasmin samāśvastaḥ sarvakāryāṇi niḥkṣipet |
GSD36manu1__u:2665: Manu7.59c/ tena sārdhaṃ viniścitya tataḥ karma samārabhet ||
GSD36manu1__u:2666: Manu7.60a/ anyān api prakurvīta śucīn prājñān avasthitān |
GSD36manu1__u:2670: Manu7.62a/ teṣām arthe niyuñjīta śūrān dakṣān kula.udgatān |
GSD36manu1__u:2674: Manu7.64a/ anuraktaḥ śucir dakṣaḥ smṛtimān deśa.kālavit |

GSD36manu1__u:2676: Manu7.65a/ amātye daṇḍa āyatto daṇḍe vainayikī kriyā |
GSD36manu1__u:2677: Manu7.65c/ nṛpatau kośa.rāṣṭre ca dūte saṃdhi.viparyayau ||
GSD36manu1__u:2678: Manu7.66a/ dūta eva hi saṃdhatte bhinatty eva ca saṃhatān |
GSD36manu1__u:2679: Manu7.66c/ dūtas tat kurute karma bhidyante yena mānavaḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2680: Manu7.67a/ sa vidyād asya kṛtyeṣu nirgūḍha.iṅgita.ceṣṭitaiḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2681: Manu7.67c/ ākāram iṅgitaṃ ceṣṭāṃ bhṛtyeṣu ca cikīrṣitam ||
GSD36manu1__u:2682: Manu7.68a/ buddhvā ca sarvaṃ tattvena pararājacikīrṣitam |
GSD36manu1__u:2683: Manu7.68c/ tathā prayatnam ātiṣṭhed yathā-ātmānaṃ na pīḍayet ||
GSD36manu1__u:2685: Manu7.69c/ ramyam ānata.sāmantaṃ svājīvyaṃ deśam āvaset ||
GSD36manu1__u:2686: Manu7.70a/ dhanva.durgaṃ mahī.durgam ab.durgaṃ vārkṣam eva vā |
GSD36manu1__u:2687: Manu7.70c/ nṛdurgaṃ giridurgaṃ vā samāśritya vaset puram ||
GSD36manu1__u:2688: Manu7.71a/ sarveṇa tu prayatnena giridurgaṃ samāśrayet |
GSD36manu1__u:2689: Manu7.71c/ eṣāṃ hi bāhuguṇyena giridurgaṃ viśiṣyate ||
GSD36manu1__u:2690: Manu7.72a/ triṇy ādyāny āśritās tv eṣāṃ mṛga.gartāśraya.apcarāḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2692: Manu7.73a/ yathā durgāśritān etān na-upahiṃsanti śatravaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2693: Manu7.73c/ tathā-arayo na hiṃsanti nṛpaṃ durgasamāśritam ||
GSD36manu1__u:2694: Manu7.74a/ ekaḥ śataṃ yodhayati prākārastho dhanurdharaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2695: Manu7.74c/ śataṃ daśasahasrāṇi tasmād durgaṃ vidhīyate ||
GSD36manu1__u:2696: Manu7.75a/ tat syād āyudhasaṃpannaṃ dhana.dhānyena vāhanaiḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2697: Manu7.75c/ brāhmaṇaiḥ śilpibhir yantrair yavasena-udakena ca ||
GSD36manu1__u:2698: Manu7.76a/ tasya madhye suparyāptaṃ kārayed gṛham ātmanaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2700: Manu7.77a/ tad adhyāsya-udvahed bhāryāṃ sa.varṇāṃ lakṣaṇānvitām |
GSD36manu1__u:2701: Manu7.77c/ kule mahati saṃbhūtāṃ hṛdyāṃ rūpa.guṇānvītām ||
GSD36manu1__u:2702: Manu7.78a/ purohitaṃ ca kurvīta vṛṇuyād eva ca-ṛtvijaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2703: Manu7.78c/ te 'asya gṛhyāṇi karmāṇi kuryur vaitānikāni ca ||
GSD36manu1__u:2704: Manu7.79a/ yajeta rājā kratubhir vividhair āpta.dakṣiṇaiḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2705: Manu7.79c/ dharmārthaṃ ca-eva viprebhyo dadyād bhogān dhanāni ca ||
GSD36manu1__u:2706: Manu7.80a/ sāṃvatsarikam āptaiś ca rāṣṭrād āhārayed balim |
GSD36manu1__u:2707: Manu7.80c/ syāc ca-āmnāya.paro loke varteta pitṛvat-nṛṣu ||
GSD36manu1__u:2708: Manu7.81a/ adhyakṣān vividhān kuryāt tatra tatra vipaścitaḥ |
GSD36manu1__u:2709: Manu7.81c/ te 'asya sarvāṇy avekṣeran nṛṇāṃ kāryāṇi kurvatām ||
GSD36manu1__u:2710: Manu7.82a/ āvṛttānāṃ gurukulād viprāṇāṃ pūjako bhavet |
GSD36manu1__u:2711: Manu7.82c/ nṛpāṇām akṣayo hy eṣa nidhir brāhmo 'abhidhīyate ||
GSD36manu1__u:2712: Manu7.83a/ na taṃ stenā na ca-amitrā haranti na ca naśyati |
GSD36manu1__u:2713: Manu7.83c/ tasmād rājñā nidhātavyo brāhmaṇeṣv akṣayo nidhiḥ ||
GSD36manu1__u:2714: Manu7.84a/ na skandate na vyathate na vinaśyati karhi cit |[M. na skandati na cyavate]
GSD36manu1__u:2715: Manu7.84c/ variṣṭham agnihotrebhyo brāhmaṇasya mukhe hutam ||
GSD36manu1__u:2716: Manu7.85a/ samam abrāhmaṇe dānaṃ dviguṇaṃ brāhmaṇabruve |
GSD36manu1__u:2719: Manu7.86a/ pātrasya hi viśeṣeṇa śraddadhānatayā-eva ca |
GSD36manu1__u:2720: Manu7.86c/ alpaṃ vā bahu vā pretya dānasya phalam aśnute ||
